        private void getLegalMovesDown(boolean[][] board,
                     int enemy)
        Modifies the provided boolean-array to reflect all possible moves towards the left direction
        Parameters:
        board - The array which will represent the possible moves
        enemy - An int representing the enemy color as specified by the constants in Chesspiece

      • threatensDown

        private boolean threatensDown(int row)
        Checks if the piece is threatening the provided position in a downwards direction

        Note: This method assumes that the column is the same

        Parameters:
        row - The row to check if this piece is threatening
        Returns:
        True if this piece is threatening the position

      • threatensLeft

        private boolean threatensLeft(int column)
        Checks if the piece is threatening the provided position toward the left

        Note: This method assumes that the row is the same

        Parameters:
        column - The column to check if this piece is threatening
        Returns:
        True if this piece is threatening the position

        Parameters:

        column - The column that the opposing king is on
        Returns:
        True if this piece is threatening the given position
